pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access the Michigan Substance Use Vulnerability Index (MI-SUVI) // Easily import the MI-SUVI data sets. The user can import data sets with full metrics, percentiles, Z-scores, or rankings. Data is available at both the County and Zip Code Tabulation Area (ZCTA) levels. This package also includes a function to import shape files for easy mapping and a function to access the full technical documentation. All data is sourced from (https://www.michigan.gov/opioids/category-data).
